basic.name: Dat Do
basic.label: Software Engineer
basic.summary: Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the oil & energy industry. Skilled in Computer Science, Amazon Web Services (AWS), iOS Development, Agile Methodologies. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor of Science (B.S.) focused in Computer Science from Wentworth Institute of Technology.

highlights: Developing and designing software solutions to improve safety and efficiency for the energy industry
Integrating cutting-edge technologies (Artificial Intelligence, IoT) into software applications, delivering highly specialized system to assets and end clients
Utilizing cloud infrastructure to enable globally available software products, with intensive computing capability
Taking initiative on unifying React UI components across multiple projects and solutions via Storybook
Making contribution toward Software team developer standards and guidelines through documentation, conventional/atomic commits, CI/CD automation, and versioning
Prototyped a highly scalable software product to semi-automate digital hydrostatic test instruments
Developed and designed intuitive interfaces with fast response time for both mobile devices and cloud-based applications
Integrated wireless communication for software products to send/receive data from IoT devices

work.position: Learning Lab Leader & Math FSG Tutor
highlights: Created learning strategy and held a 2-hour session to help approximately 15 students per week in Mathematics and Computer Science
Facilitated study group along with professors to help students excel in various Mathematics subjects
Managed computing and printing equipment at the Wentworth's Print Lab Center
Developed and designed websites for small businesses and non-profit organizations

volunteer.summary: A hackathon for students by students, with a mission to promote diversity and accessibility in our tech community
highlights: Led a team of 18 to launch Wentworthâ€™s first annual student-run Hackathon with over 200 participants
Managed finances and promotional materials for the event, raising over $30,000 from sponsors
Built website and registration infrastructure using AWS

volunteer.summary: Annual Japanese culture festival in Boston
highlights: Volunteered at food booth and lead a team to keep the festival as clean and tidy as possible

volunteer.summary: Meets pressing community needs by mobilizing caring New Yorkers in volunteer service
highlights: Renovated parks in New York

volunteer.summary: VietxNepal is a fundraising group created by Vietnamese student to support Nepal after the earthquake.
highlights: Developed promotion materials and website for the non-profit organizations
